title: (x) Yahoo Identity font - Able {Stephen}
content:
What typeface was used for the YAHOO! ID?

 [‹ (x) Serif face in Peter Rabbit books by Beatrix Potter - RabbitType {Stian Høiås (self)}](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106163325/http:/typophile.com/node/38034 "Go to previous forum topic") [New typeface ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071106163325/http:/typophile.com/node/38046 "Go to next forum topic")
author: mediacen
